h2. Create Machine Bucket
{{html:
    <hr>
<div class="form-horizontal">
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Name:</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <input ng-model="machine.name" type="text" class="input-xxlarge" placeholder="Name"/>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label">Description:</label>
        <div class="controls">
            <textarea ng-model="machine.description" type="text" class="input-xxlarge" placeholder="Description" />
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >OS Image</label>
        <div class="controls ">{{include:image_list}}</div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="control-group machineList">
        <label class="control-label">Package *:</label>
        <ul class="controls" >
            <!-- {{include:plan_list}} -->
            <li ng-repeat="size in sizes | orderBy:sizepredicate">
                <a href="" ng-model="machine.sizeId" btn-radio="size.id" 
                ng-disabled="!!(size.id*1 < oldMachine.sizeId*1)">
                {[ numeral(size.memory * 1024 * 1024).format('0 b') ]}  Memory, </br>
                {[ size.vcpus ]} core(s), </br>
                {[ size.description ]}</a>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>

}}
h2. Options
{{html:
    <hr>
    <div class="control-group">
        <label class="control-label" >Increase disk size to:</label>
        <div class="controls " >
            {{include:storage_list}}
        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>

    <div class="form-actions">
        <button class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-click="saveNewMachine()" ng-disabled="!isValid()">Create</button>
    </div>
    <hr>
}}
    {{div: class=msg}}
	*Fair use policy for Unlimited Transfer:*
        * Small machines: &lt;= 4 cores = 1 Mbit/s average usage per month
        * Large machines: &gt;= 5 cores = 5 Mbit/s average usage per month
    _This fits 99% of our customers. If you need more bandwidth, we have special plans, contact us!_
	{{div}}


{{html: </div>}}
